# dataRepresentation

**Instance Property**

Returns the opaque data representation of the hardware model.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataRepresentation: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use this to recreate the same hardware model with [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacHardwareModel/init(dataRepresentation:)].

## Configuring the hardware model

- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the host supports this hardware model.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the host supports this hardware model.
items.name: isSupported
